languages.text: {n}Они притихают — словно корка льда накрыла кипящую влагу водного резервуара. Никто не смеет быть Тем, Чье Имя Произнесено. Никто не осмеливается покинуть толпу и утратить защиту безымянности.{/n}

{n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Они притихают — словно корка льда накрыла кипящую влагу водного резервуара. Никто не смеет быть Тем, Чье Имя Произнесено. Никто не осмеливается покинуть толпу и утратить защиту безымянности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They subside, as if a crust of ice had covered the boiling moisture in a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of being nameless.{/n}

{n}They subside, as if a crust of ice had covered the boiling moisture in a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of being nameless.{/n}

{n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

{n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

{n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

{n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie verstummen, als hätte sich eine Eisfläche auf der unruhigen Oberfläche eines Wassertanks gebildet. Niemand will derjenige sein, dessen Name ausgesprochen wird. Niemand will die Menge verlassen und den Schutz der Anonymität verlieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie verstummen, als hätte sich eine Eisfläche auf der unruhigen Oberfläche eines Wassertanks gebildet. Niemand will derjenige sein, dessen Name ausgesprochen wird. Niemand will die Menge verlassen und den Schutz der Anonymität verlieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se quedan congelados, como si una capa de hielo se hubiera formado en la superficie burbujeante de un tanque de agua. Nadie osa ser el Nombrado. Nadie se atreve a abandonar la masa y perder la protección del anonimato.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se quedan congelados, como si una capa de hielo se hubiera formado en la superficie burbujeante de un tanque de agua. Nadie osa ser el Nombrado. Nadie se atreve a abandonar la masa y perder la protección del anonimato.{/n}

languages.text: {n}まるで水槽の濁った水面に氷が張るように、彼らは静まり返る。誰も、名を語られる者になる勇気を持つ者はいないのだ。誰も群衆から離れて、匿名で守られる存在ではなくなる勇気を持つ者はいないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで水槽の濁った水面に氷が張るように、彼らは静まり返る。誰も、名を語られる者になる勇気を持つ者はいないのだ。誰も群衆から離れて、匿名で守られる存在ではなくなる勇気を持つ者はいないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群安静了下来，仿佛沸腾的水面忽然结了一层冰。没人敢成为那个被点到名字的人，没有人胆敢离开人群的庇护，将自己的身份公之于众。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群安静了下来，仿佛沸腾的水面忽然结了一层冰。没人敢成为那个被点到名字的人，没有人胆敢离开人群的庇护，将自己的身份公之于众。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ils s'immobilisent, comme si une couche de glace s'était formée à la surface agitée d'une citerne. Personne n'ose être celui dont le nom sera prononcé. Personne n'ose quitter la foule et perdre la protection de l'anonymat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ils s'immobilisent, comme si une couche de glace s'était formée à la surface agitée d'une citerne. Personne n'ose être celui dont le nom sera prononcé. Personne n'ose quitter la foule et perdre la protection de l'anonymat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su deposunun silindir yüzeyinde oluşmuş bir buz tabakası misali yerlerinden kıpırdamıyorlar. Kimse, Adı Anılan olmaya niyetli değil. Kimse, kalabalıktan ayrılıp gizliliğin korumasını kaybetmeye niyetli değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They grow still, as though a sheet of ice had formed on the roiling surface of a water tank. No one dares to be the One Whose Name Is Spoken. No one dares to leave the crowd and lose the protection of anonymity.{/n}
